documents.document: My neighbours need to stop with the interomptu block party and go the heck to sleep.
@TransLink No show on the 5:05 402 at Richmond Centre?
I know it's not even 11am, but I'm already so over today.
Bring on the anxious/guilty feelings because I can't get to school today.
There's a train of people literally stranded at Aberdeen Station right now. This is ridiculous.
@UBC Barely half the buses that go to campus have hour long waits, or aren't moving at all. The Canada Line is also severely delayed...
Does anyone else enjoy the full body sigh that happens when you lay down after a long-ass day? It's pretty great, ngl.
@panikin can't forget the frantic off-tune guitar strumming
@panikin My sentiments exactly.
Just in case any of you forgot, I'm head over heels for @bprost. He's honestly the BEST.
Today was definitely one of those days where your brain goes so fast that it just stops working altogether.
Cool, but in like the scariest way. https://t.co/Y0xaShwF1j
All I wanna do is have a bath, but NOOOOOO the house hasn't been scrubbed within an inch of its life yet. #FernMoves
@bprost Reason why I love you #51.
It's nice that there's always some variety to it. You can only handle so much falsetto in your life. https://t.co/lq5tccoVU2
I did a thing last night and it's a very very good thing. https://t.co/VXdcmsORYG
@sakuraaferguson YAY! I thought you might. #LLAMA
#NowPlaying Let Me Go by HAIM ♫ https://t.co/8guVNjksHN
@madmccord Which ultimately leads me to the question: why is there no season preview for your year yet????
@madmccord especially as someone who needs routine and structure in order to feel productive and balanced.
It's rather daunting to think about 2017, and realize that your whole life is going to shift into a new normal.
Dear fellow student in my theatre lecture, I'm pretty sure we all know very well that you went to fucking Guildhall. ENOUGH. #AFernAtUBC
My stomach is definitely not understanding that it needs to stay INSIDE my body.
Here's to a chill 2017 • #NowPlaying No Shade in the Shadow of The Cross by Sufjan Stevens ♫ https://t.co/1G1ZITmn93
@sakuraaferguson YES, a thousand times, yes.
@sakuraaferguson I want to retweet this so badly. 😂😂
God bless heating pads.
It's the most wonderful time of the EAR. #merrychristmas https://t.co/32IWmasf64
"Who the fuck gives a tiny ass designer cake as a Christmas gift?"
I think she granted me good luck before my exam! #AFernAndAStanAtUBC https://t.co/GV108IlI2o
#NowPlaying Stacy's Mom by Fountains Of Wayne ♫ https://t.co/mGHcvcbwJK
Two more days, and I'll have dragged my sorry ass over the finish line for the semester. #AFernAtUBC #IHaveTheTimeManagementSkillsofaPeanut
@brandybernard either way, I'm looking forward to more #BrandysBath snaps!
@brandybernard if that's not one of the rings of hell, I don't know what is.
@brandybernard still not over this tbh
Spotify recommended that I listen to @daywavemusic, and for once, I'm glad I listened to Spotify. #goodtunes
@sakuraaferguson or anything. They've got 0 arch support.
I am honestly flabbergasted at the number of people who think Ugg-type footwear is practical for snow.
This speaks to me. https://t.co/UWjo8KRFk6
@madmccord update: sister has knocked on wall, passive-aggressively telling me to STFU.
It's 1 am, and I'm in bed laugh-crying at a video of a man telling his goat Kevin to stop being a dick.
I want my long hair and femme looks back again. https://t.co/JJ1MNJh1cx
You know it's been a weird day at work when customers keep tweeting you eggplant emojis.
@brandybernard I'm pretty sure they're immortal.
@brandybernard what I want to know is if the eggs are stuffed with anything... I'm gonna go with jello or pickled onions.
All I want for Christmas is an aspic aquarium. 🐠🌴🐬 https://t.co/ZTrSrcBqya
Who needs crickets or bullfrog croaks to fall asleep when you can listen to your sister burp consistently through the night.
Last paper of the semester, and I'm struggling to even outline it. I am feeling very deflated right now.
@madmccord Angelina: "If a girl's a slut, she should be abused." #WHAT #JSRewatch
I am shocked that I was so oblivious to the misogynistic, slut-shaming, non-consensual antics that happened on Jersey Shore. #JSRewatch
A week in photos. https://t.co/UhNZSFUUBG
@SajeWellness Thanks for the love y'all!
Very excited for my new @SajeWellness products to arrive! I finally get to have my own Peppermint Halo 😇💕✨
Sometimes the words aren't there anymore, and you just end up writing whatever comes into your head, and that's whe… https://t.co/IQxtCsv8tq
@madmccord Actually, I'd like it put on the record that I did a bit of planning pre-tonight, so I think I can get some points for that???
Mashup mine and @bprost's tweets and I get: This motherfucker is going to be the only person watching this film. #accurate
@TatyB94 think about how much better you'll feel once you've done it!!!
Kind of happy I'm sick, it's given me a chance to watch @TheCrownNetflix. Boy oh boy, it's been a treat.
@sakuraaferguson aww thanks bernie 😘
@madmccord in short, you can't have it all Miss Fern, you just can't.
Do you ever feel like you make steps forward in some parts of your life, but then one part falls way way back? That's how I feel rn.
#FernTip - Let your Fern sleep for more than 2-3 hours. Believe me, they NEED it.
@iBreedBySpores I've got to keep writing now. Don't bother me.
@iBreedBySpores I don't know if it looks good on me, but do I really care?
I feel as though if I were to start living my life as Margot Tennenbaum did, I'd achieve more of my goals.
Said it once this morning, and I'll say it once more. I'm about ready to go into hibernation and wake up in five years.
@madmccord so I'm gonna go make some toast and cry brb
Fall/winter is already sucking my soul out of me. I can feel it.
And I think they made the right choice with Driver. https://t.co/4Fubr9OwyL
@sakuraaferguson This is h-core stressing me out.
Just in case anyone forgot, I'm still infatuated with Benedict Cumberbatch.
Will Ferrell's juggling routine to Evanesence on The Office is comedy gold. Pure, solid gold.
"I'm a huge Woody Allen fan, although I've only seen Antz."
I've officially reached the "do or die" point of the semester, and naturally all I want to do is watch Annie Hall on repeat. #AFernAtUBC
Feeling incredibly grateful to have @bprost in my life these past few days. I can't wait to see him in the flesh in December.
@danwithatwist I honestly can't handle myself right now.
@brandybernard BRANDY i can't EVEN right now
Something about this needs to be ILLEGAL. https://t.co/Bl9etse1fX
How to cook a pot roast: 1. Take it out of the M&M packaging and put it in the oven. 2. Crank some DMX and chill out til that suckers done.
I thought I was done with this fucking show. Obvs not. https://t.co/jIhO28u8ux
In spite of yesterday, I've just been kicking ass at life lately. Thank you universe for proving hard work gets you places.
FUDGE RIGHT OFF https://t.co/haGugkgcdq
Do you ever get the hiccups and think about how terrifying it'd be to have them for twenty years? Because I do.
tfw you have a good session w ur counsellor, but the second you leave your day just plunges into awfulness
#NowPlaying Dean’s Room by Allison Cruthfield ♫ https://t.co/kPDSYbvvwF
@bprost on the photos I have of him - "Don’t you have any hot ones of my butt or something" #nope https://t.co/7h3xe5X8DB
@danwithatwist oh yeah, she's golden.
@danwithatwist DANI WHY IS YOUR CAT A FREAKING MODEL???
@madmccord I'd like it to be noted that I started with none a month ago, and currently own three.
At the rate that I'm going, I'm going to estimate that I'll own five copies of The Oresteia by the end of the semester.
Trophy hunting is neither ethical, nor sustainable. Take action and #BanTrophyHunting! https://t.co/bp28bWyFQ1… https://t.co/oQaljfcFqe
Alright, I just impulsively bought Harry Potter wand makeup brushes. Adulting is going well tonight.
All of you better wish you were living with me because I'm making some kickass dinners this week. #OnWednesdaysWeEatRamen
@bprost I would like it noted that he did try to converse w me before this but just couldn't do it haha
@bprost is the cutest when I call and he's half-asleep. "Thank you for calling, but I'm gonna... I'm gonna go back to sleep now. Okay?"
This man knows how to make a banger. #NowPlaying 24K Magic by Bruno Mars ♫ https://t.co/i00eCiQ8Uf
@sakuraaferguson idk how i missed liking this but I LIKE THIS
FUUUUU- undercooked veg and pasta??? who the eff do I think I am??? I'm ashamed of myself.

@madmccord Monsters are very real, and deserve to mash always.
